uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter

Class SQLValueFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.filter.SQLValueFilter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of object selected
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseFilter<T>, BaseSQLFilter<T>, PatternFilter<T>, SQLFilter<T>, Targetted<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataObjectFactory.MatchFilter, DataObjectFactory.TimeFilter, ReferenceFilter, ValueFilter

    public class SQLValueFilter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLFilter<T>, PatternFilter<T>
    Simple SQLFilter to match based on the value of a field. The filter is constructed with a Repository so the field name can be qualified. It is legal but to pass null (the filter will select all records) but not recommended as this will cause problems if filters are combined via a join.
    Author:
    spb
